p.k: Two rehabilitated sloths are released back into the wild, Claire reveals the athletic secrets of the jungle gym and Sloth Scientist Becky
Sanctuary favourite, Sidwiggy, puts a new tracking system to the test, Claire becomes a sloth anger management counsellor and Becky reveals the secret life of sloth fur
78% Debbie is torn between her boyfriend and her peeing cat Blinkie. Krisi and Jason want to get married, but standing in their way is her crazy cat, Frankie
78% Ambreen has been in an abusive relationship for the past 13 years, but her abuser is her cat, Calvin. Can Jackson Galaxy help Ambreen to get her life back?
When Tia receives an adoption email unlike any other, she makes a cross-country trip to find a dog a home before Christmas. Plus, the family get an unforgettable gift
Tia is in Detroit helping a rescue facility at risk of closure. Villalobos looks for a stray pit bull nearby and a grieving adopter wants a dog to heal her heart
The team devises a ‘Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure’-themed terrarium. Triathlete Jordan wants a sport-themed modern art enclosure for her lizard
Investigators take on one of their most dangerous operations to save a group of bears and tigers held captive in a chicken shed
Houston SPCA investigators act quickly when a panicked dog struggles between life and death, and the team rescue cats living in cockroach-infested squalor
74% The Raneys arrives at a homestead with a bee-obsessed owner unintentionally attracting bears with his hives. Plus, dangerous winds threaten the bathhouse
The team welcomes a blind goat called Charlie and two ducklings. Meanwhile, Ginger the goat embraces her new prosthetics and two pigs have a tussle
Dwight the cow is taken to Indiana to receive hydrotherapy. Meanwhile, Dan welcomes over a dozen exotic farm animals and Lola the goat is ready to walk again!
Dan and Chris head across Lake Michigan to adopt two little piglets. Meanwhile, a rooster has surgery and Steve the grumpy goat needs help with his rage
A trio of abandoned puma cubs arrives at the zoo. Meanwhile, a Caribbean flamingo is born at the zoo after nearly 20 years, and Otto the stallion makes his debut
The African penguin colony welcome their newest additions after a successful mating season. Plus, a sea otter is introduced to the rest of the raft
78% Sandy and Phil were happily married until they adopted their cat Woody. The couple is convinced that Woody is evil enough to kill their other cat, Pirate
78% Mike and Patricia love their cats, but unfortunately their cats do not love each other. Patricia, a ghost hunter, thinks there is a supernatural reason why
When an adopted dog mysteriously appears in a Mississippi shelter, Tania and Earl go to the rescue. Parolee Joe is shaken after separating two stray dogs fighting
After the great flood of 2016 devastates Louisiana, Tia and the Villalobos team help the victims. An elderly woman is hospitalised and separated from her dogs
In 2011, a great white shark called Colossus swam off never to be seen again. Now, a team of shark experts has assembled to bring this Giant up from the deep
A mysterious infection brings a tough athlete to his knees, a teenager contracts a feared disease, and a woman's brain is practically set on fire
It's touch-and-go when sanctuary lothario, Randy, succumbs to an infection, a new arrival gets a presidential welcome and Becky unravels the secrets of sloth attraction
The sanctuary team try to save a poisoned sloth, Claire turns sloth sleuth to find a much-loved missing toy, and Becky tries to pin down the secret of sloth manliness
Do parrots really know what they’re talking about? How do electric eels not electrocute themselves? Plus, why are panda’s black and white? Experts answer these questions!
